means: 纯白的，无瑕疵的，纯洁的

sentence.Network_en: They want me to conform, to be lily-white.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们要我循规蹈矩，要我清白无瑕。

sentence.Network_en: Lily: It's nice to meet you, Jessica. My name is Lily White.
sentence.Network_cn: 李莉: 认识你很高兴, 杰丝卡,我叫李莉. 怀特.

sentence.Network_en: The heroine was a tall, slim blonde with lily - white skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 女主人公长得很高, 身材苗条,皮肤洁白.
